MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 01-DEC-2020 20:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW1 postcode area of Crewe affecting properties in North Street. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the underground cable network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:31pm on the 1st December 2020.
